Replace if necessary.
Check the height
position of the pouch-
picking frame is in line
with belt and the
condition of the
vacuum sucker.
Replace sucker if

of rubber roller is

if necessary.

4.7F9

Maintenance
Checklist MDB

Maintenance
Checklist MDB

-

-

Day Shift Operator

4.7F9

Maintenance
Checklist MDB

-

•  Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers,

Rubber Roller, and Punches & Packing Table.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new one.

•
•  Ensure that frames of machines & rails where excess grease may be, is wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.
•  No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease and other lubricants.

Controlled Copy
